desc.nl: Step into a world of contemporary elegance with this newly built luxury villa, ideally positioned in one of Moraira’s most desirable enclaves. Just a short stroll from golden beaches, fine dining, stylish bars, and boutique shops, this exceptional home is designed for effortless Mediterranean living. Spanning three expansive levels and offering breathtaking panoramic sea views—from the coastline of Moraira to the iconic Peñon de Ifach—this property masterfully blends modern architecture with warm, inviting spaces. Property Overview 3 Bedrooms | 3 Bathrooms Plot: 763 m² Built Area: 285 m² Terraces, Rooftop Solarium, Mediterranean Garden Interior Highlights Elegant entrance hall leading into a bright, open-plan living and dining space with a contemporary fireplace Sleek, fully fitted modern kitchen Guest WC on the main floor Ground-level bedroom with en-suite bathroom Two further bedroom suites upstairs, each with private bathrooms and direct terrace access Rooftop solarium with panoramic Mediterranean views – the perfect spot for sunset cocktails Lower level includes a private wine cellar, guest apartment, and versatile space for a gym, cinema room, or home office

nl.p: Luxe villa met zeezicht te koop in Altea Hills

Deze prachtige villa te koop in Altea Hills biedt ongeëvenaarde luxe in een van de meest exclusieve gebieden aan de Costa Blanca. Het pand is gebouwd in 2006 en beslaat 350m² met 318m² prachtig ontworpen leefruimte. De villa beschikt over 5 ruime slaapkamers met ingebouwde kasten en 3 elegante badkamers, waaronder een grote slaapkamer met ensuite badkamer en inloopkast.

Het interieur van de villa is een meesterwerk, met een dubbelhoge ingang en een eetkamer met panoramische ramen met een adembenemend uitzicht op zee van Altea tot Benidorm. De keuken, uitgerust met een kookeiland en hoogwaardige apparatuur, combineert functionaliteit met stijl, waardoor het een culinair toevluchtsoord is.

Buiten bieden de uitgestrekte terrassen, het privézwembad en de buitenbarbecue de perfecte setting voor ontspanning en entertainment. De villa beschikt ook over een afgesloten garage en een extra overdekte parkeerplaats.
Ervaar het ultieme luxe leven in de veilige en prestigieuze urbanisatie Altea Hills . Neem vandaag nog contact met ons op om een bezoek te plannen en van deze droomvilla uw nieuwe thuis te maken!

desc.en: Villa for sale Benissa    A Bold Architectural Statement in Racó de Galeno, Benissa    Minimalist Design. Mediterranean Soul. Elevated Living.    In the prestigious enclave of Racó de Galeno—between Moraira and Calpe — this villa is a striking expression of contemporary Mediterranean architecture, designed to blend raw materiality with the beauty of the natural surroundings. Positioned on a south-facing plot with panoramic views of the sea and surrounding mountains, this property delivers both dramatic design and refined living.    Constructed almost entirely of exposed concrete, complemented by travertine marble, natural stone walls, and warm wood accents, the villa is bold in concept and serene in execution. Every line and texture has been considered for its visual impact and connection to the landscape. From the double-height living spaces to the cantilevered terraces that appear to float above the hillside, the design creates a sense of weightless sophistication.        Property Features     South-facing plot in Benissa’s most sought-after location    4 bedrooms | Multiple terraces | Guest apartment with private entrance    Signature concrete architecture with floating structural elements    Spa-inspired bathrooms clad in travertine marble    Infinity pool overlooking the Mediterranean    Double-height living room with clean-lined fireplace    Elevator and floating concrete staircase    Home automation, underfloor heating & zoned air conditioning    Outdoor kitchen & BBQ area for open-air dining    Covered parking plus additional guest parking     Interior highlights include a sleek, fully equipped kitchen, expansive lounge areas, and direct outdoor access from every level. The rooftop and poolside terraces offer sun-drenched and shaded spaces for entertaining, dining, and relaxing, all while taking in uninterrupted views of the Peñón de Ifach and Moraira's Portet Bay.    A separate garden-level suite with kitchen and private terrace provides flexible living options—ideal for guests, staff, or a dedicated wellness space.        Benissa Costa: Discreet Luxury, Timeless Beauty    Benissa Costa is the hidden jewel of the northern Costa Blanca. Known for its crystalline coves, pine-fringed cliffs, and elevated sea-view villas, the area combines natural beauty with quiet sophistication. Just minutes from Moraira’s upscale marina, award-winning restaurants, and artisan boutiques, it offers a seamless blend of lifestyle and luxury.    Whether you're setting sail to Ibiza from the nearby ports, exploring the region’s renowned hiking trails, or enjoying sunset dining on a cliffside terrace, Benissa Costa offers an exceptional quality of life. With easy access to international schools, Alicante and Valencia airports, and a year-round climate, it remains one of the most sought-after destinations for global buyers.        Architecturally striking, intimately connected to its setting, and built for modern Mediterranean life— this is a villa that doesn’t just stand out, it belongs.    Contact us today to know more or to schedule a private viewing of this magnificent Villa for sale in Benissa!
